mapper.insert: insert into users(user_id, user_pw, user_nick, joined_at) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_nick},now())
mapper.update: update users set user_nick = #{user_nick}, user_pw = #{user_pw} where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND user_pw = #{user_pw}
